entry.source: 〉 You hear a voice coming from the other{F801}side of the wall...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You hear a voice coming from the other{F801}side of the wall...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F813,1,403221}It wasn't supposed to be like this...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F813,1,403221}It wasn't supposed to be like this...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0I cooperated with Xi Wangmu because{F801}she said she'd drive out the{F801}Ashura-kai!{F801}{F802}But it turned out the Ashura-kai was{F801}the only thing stopping her from eating{F801}us humans whenever she pleased...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0I cooperated with Xi Wangmu because{F801}she said she'd drive out the{F801}Ashura-kai!{F801}{F802}But it turned out the Ashura-kai was{F801}the only thing stopping her from eating{F801}us humans whenever she pleased...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0This is the Ashura-kai's fault too!{F801}They never told anybody how important{F801}they were...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0This is the Ashura-kai's fault too!{F801}They never told anybody how important{F801}they were...!{F801}
